nmrglue.process.proc_base.ext¶

nmrglue.process.proc_base.ext(data, x0=None, xn=None, y0=None, yn=None)¶

Extract Region

Parameters:

  • data Array of spectral data.
  • x0 X-axis extract region start.
  • xn X-axis extract region end.
  • y0 Y-axis extract region start.
  • yn Y-axis extract region end.
